mapper.select: SELECT users.id, users.pen_name, users.e_mail, users.password, users.birth_year, users.birth_month, users.birth_day, users.user_category, users.locked, users.expired, user_roles.role_id, role_master.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN ( SELECT users.id, @RN := @RN + 1 AS RN FROM users, (SELECT @RN := 0) RC WHERE users.pen_name = #{penName} ) RC ON users.id = RC.id INNER JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.user_id = users.id INNER JOIN role_master ON role_master.id = 1 AND role_master.id = user_roles.role_id WHERE users.pen_name = #{penName} AND RC.RN = 1
